metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8111 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Apache Tomcat Connectors (mod_jk) before 1.2.41 ignores JkUnmount rules forsubtrees of previous JkMount rules, which allows remote attackers to accessotherwise restricted artifacts via unspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8111` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libapache2-mod-jk - 1:1.2.40+svn150520-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libapache-mod-jk package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.2.40+svn150520-1').
